# zendesk_dynamic_content (Resource)

Due to limitation of zendesk API creates a placeholder dynamic_content_variant with placeholder text.

## Example Usage

```terraform
# API reference:
#   https://developer.zendesk.com/rest_api/docs/support/dynamic_content

resource "zendesk_dynamic_content" "example" {
  name = "My Dynamic Content"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `name` (String) Name of the Dynamic Content Item.

### Optional

- `id` (String) The ID of this resource.

### Read-Only

- `locale_id` (Number) Default Locale Id for the dynamic content item.
- `url` (String) The API url of this dynamic content item.

## Notes

- Due to Zendesk API limitations, creating a dynamic content item automatically creates a placeholder dynamic_content_variant with placeholder text.
